meanings.definition: The elected head of a republican state.
meanings.sent1: The president of our country makes important decisions.
meanings.sent2: The president of the club welcomed new members.
meanings.sent3: The president of the class declared a homework-free day.
meanings.sent4: She is the president of the student council, leading with authority.
meanings.sent5: The president's speech inspired the nation during tough times.

meanings.definition: The chief officer of a branch of government, corporation, or society.
meanings.sent1: The company president oversees all operations.
meanings.sent2: The president of the United States is the leader of the nation.
meanings.sent3: The president of the chess club strategized a winning move.
meanings.sent4: As the president of the company, he steers it towards success.
meanings.sent5: The president of the organization ensures smooth functioning.

meanings.definition: The highest-ranking officer in an organization.
meanings.sent1: The university president presides over academic matters.
meanings.sent2: The president of the bank manages financial decisions.
meanings.sent3: The president of the fan club organized a fun event.
meanings.sent4: She is the president of the committee, leading discussions.
meanings.sent5: The president of the team motivates players to excel.
